citation.title: Analyzing the Sounds of Languages

facebook.title: Analyzing the Sounds of Languages
facebook.summary: Congratulations to Bridget Smith, Mary Beckman and Anouschka Foltz, (with many thanks to Jennifer Zhang) on the publication of their new book, Analyzing the sounds of languages. The text has been used as the basis for our LING 2051 course of the same name
